ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Plintissa was outraged, she was sick of being blamed for stuff she never did! plintissa called the Radicons, Wrath, Kamodia, and the Sin brothers on her

Plintissa was outraged, she was sick of being blamed for stuff she never
did! plintissa called the Radicons, Wrath, Kamodia, and the Sin brothers on
her commlink.

"All People's troops, we will soon destroy the Maximals, get ready."
Plintissa said. Of course her troops would spare Iron Raptor, however, but
she walked to the base to say goodbye to her old friend Iron Raptor. She
passed Ramhorn on the bridge, looking at him she laughed.

"Little Ramhorn, Maximal worshipper!" Plintissa said. Plintissa walked away
from the base, deciding to tell Iron Raptor goodbye over commlink. Plintissa
and Dracona walked out and sat in the meadow. Plintissa called out to Liono
on her commlink.

"Liono, I don't give a damn about your troops. It's time for some maiming."
Plintissa said. Dracona pulled out a heavy blaster rifle from her Cyber
storage compartment and handed it to Plintissa. Plintissa locked it onto her
arm and smileed. Dracona locked onto her arm an ion disk launcher.

"Let's get ready to rumble!" Plintissa yelled out. Plintissa leapt on top of
a rock, Sinesis and Sinister standing behind her with Dracona. Plintissa
called Iron Raptor on her commlink.

Iron Raptor, this is Plintissa, sorry but goodbye, I can not be your friend
anymore, all because i'm not wanted here anymore. Farewell old friend..."
----- Original Message -----
From: <RgDaN@...>

Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 1:41 AM
Subject: Re: My last post till tuesday

about

"If

playing
> with toys you have yet to understand. Even I can a mass great power but
what
> good is it if my spark is in doubt and it starts to become bitter and
twisted
> like a snake and I have to look to others to find out who I am then you
have
> your power I rather just a Lion Roaring in Night" Liono reaches the
messenger
> "tell Hellbeast and Zardus that I'll meet them at the beach sector 7629
tell
